This site and also Chris Bowen's group does not allow photos. But, you can =
post them someplace like Photobucket and then attach a link to your folder =
here. I haven't done that myself for almost a year, so you'll have to brush=
 up on posting photos on Photobucket; its free and easy to do. 

Ron STL

  I am re-shuffling my stuff and came up with an old tsuba that I think is =
early Aizu Ju Shoami.   It us signed, round, iron, and has gold inlayed lin=
es.   I can post photos or contact directly.   I will probably sell this pi=
ece as it at 3 1/8 inch diameter is a bit small for the 1860s sword I had i=
ntended it for.    Dennis
